message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm offering it to you for $170.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
